channel.title: Posts on Pete Markowsky's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pete Markowsky's Blog

item.title: Sabatical
item.description: For the next three months, I’m on a sabatical from Capsule8. To keep my wits about me and in general to try and improve my writing and use of time I’m planning on updating this blog more regularly. With that said I’m hoping to effectively use the time that I’m not spending with my family doing some projects and reading. Some project ideas: * A Github actions based app to create kubernetes clusters in a gitops style workflow

item.title: Switching to Hugo
item.description: After so many weeks of programming in go, I’ve decided to move the blog to hugo and github pages. I tried pelican but it just didn’t stick, lets see if this goes any better.
